sn46.34:1.1: “Sattime, bhikkhave, bojjhanga anavarana anivarana cetaso anupakkilesa bhavita bahulikata vijjavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaya samvattanti.
sn46.34:1.3: Satisambojjhango, bhikkhave, anavarano anivarano cetaso anupakkileso bhavito bahulikato vijjavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaya samvattati …pe… upekkhasambojjhango, bhikkhave, anavarano anivarano cetaso anupakkileso bhavito bahulikato vijjavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaya samvattati.
sn46.34:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjhanga anavarana anivarana cetaso anupakkilesa bhavita bahulikata vijjavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaya samvattanti”ti.
